rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0001
rows.name: Elma, there it is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Damn! They got to it already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0003
rows.name: No. Not yet. Look where it meets the water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0004
rows.name: Is that a force field?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0005
rows.name: The Lifehold was designed to sustain human life at all costs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
The defensive shields that surround the Core
won't go down so easily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0007
rows.name: So in other words—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0008
rows.name: We've nothing to worry about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0009
rows.name: I didn't say that. Remember—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0010
rows.name:
they don't need to break into the Core—
they just have to keep us out until time runs out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0011
rows.name: Which is soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0011_02
rows.name: Speaking of time—it's time to kick some Ganglion butt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0011_03
rows.name: Yes! Yes! Friends kick Ganglion in butts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0012
rows.name: That's the spirit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0013
rows.name:
I need you all at your best.
Everyone's counting on us to see this through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0013_2
rows.name: And we won't get a second chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0014
rows.name: All units, this is your commander, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0015
rows.name:
My team will take point. We'll breach the Core,
and then once inside, attempt to activate the backup power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0016
rows.name: Doug, Irina, Gwin, and L—you're with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0017
rows.name:
All other teams, focus on clearing our approach,
then defend our position once we're in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0018
rows.name:
That is your priority—NOT destroying all enemy craft.
Are we clear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0019
rows.name: Team Grasida, roger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0020
rows.name: Trishula, roger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0021
rows.name: Ningirsu, roger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0022
rows.name: Balmung, roger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Team Surtr, roger!
We'll take out any hostiles along your approach.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0024
rows.name: Breach team, let's go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12040100_MSG0025
rows.name: Roger![ST:wait ]
